resources.string: Delete only data of the current organization.
- The table #VAR1_BOLD# could not be deleted because it still contains data from another organization or another plug-in.\n
- An error occurred while deleting the data in table #VAR1_BOLD#.\n
\nTo completely remove the plugin the program files and the menu entry must be removed.
- An error occurred while deleting table #VAR1_BOLD#.\n
- The table #VAR1_BOLD# could not be deleted because it still contains data from another organization.\n
About the uninstall generated by the plugin entries can be deleted from the database.
Choose from the scope of the installation.\n\n***ATTENTION: This routine deletes only the entries in the Admidio database. Program files and the link in the menu will not be deleted! ***
Allows the documentation of the plugin can be opened (An existing Internet connection is required because the data is located on admidio.org).

Here a field of a consecutive number can be selected. In a selection, the current number is read out and increased according to the specified number.\n\nNOTE: FormFiller can only tell if a data field is of type "number". Whether a serial number is stored in this data field can not be recognized.

Here you have the possibility to select a FormFiller configuration if the Plugin FormFiller is installed. This could be used to create a key issue or key transfer document. KeyManager supplies the values, FormFiller the positions for the print.
Individual keys can be generated here.\n\nNote: In the "Change the key" view, you can use the "Copy the key" menu item to copy an existing key once or several times.
Key is made to the former

You can make the key to the former. This has the advantage that the data is preserved and you can see again later who has borrowed this key. If you select Delete, the record is irrevocably removed from the database, and it is no longer possible to view the data of this key.
Should this key field and the associated key data be deleted?
Key fields can be created and edited in key field maintenance.
The authorization check of the plugin failed. There is more than one menu item with the same URL defined.\n\n=> #VAR1_BOLD#
Number of keys to be added
Special case: current user or administrator

This allows users to be made without a key to a former user.

 A T T E N T I O N

 This feature should only be used if KeyManager is operated in its own organization.
A mistake happened! Users with #VAR1# could not be deleted.
All users are recipients of a key, no reconciliation can be performed.
This is just an overview of the comparison, nothing has been saved yet.\n\n Users can only be made to a former if the number of keys is 0 and they are not administrator or the current user.
The listed users are now former.
